name: Piece Goods, Notions, and Other Dry Goods
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of piece goods and dry goods. Products for
sale may include cheesecloth, drapery material, draperies or other
window coverings, fiberglass fabrics, zippers, natural or synthetic
cloth sold by the yard, belt and buckle assembly kits, textile binding,
buttons, knit and lace fabrics, ribbon, sewing accessories, thread, and
trimmings.
